data.why:
I have just finished a module I'd like to call Term::ANSIMenu (or
    something like that). It provides an OO framework for creating
    console-based menus including hotkeys, context-sensitive help,
    colors, styles, etc (it is not equivalent to perlmenu). I made some
    improvements after comments from PodMaster at perlmonks.org and
    think it is ready for the general public now. See
    http://huizen.dto.tudelft.nl/devries/files/Term-ANSIMenu-0.02.tar.gz

    After that module is accepted I plan on finishing a module
    extending the GD::Graph offerings.
